title: ATV Highway Traffic

headings.text: Game Modes of Atv Highway Traffic

controls: A/D or Left/Right Arrow Keys: MoveW or Up Arrow Key: Activate NitroS or Down Arrow Key: BrakeTab: Pause
content.developer: FreezeNova created the Atv Highway Traffic.

fullContent: Homeâ€º TrafficATV Highway TrafficBy OnlineGames.ioShall we tour the city with an ATV vehicle? It sounds like it could be a lot of fun. Atv Highway Traffic is a 3D driving game where you steer a 4-wheel vehicle. There are four maps to steer your car: a highway road, a desert road, a snowy road, and a city map. Choose your favorite track and start the engine in the simulator game.OverviewIf you are one of those who love using ATVs like us, choose your favorite game map and start using the four-wheel vehicle. Four maps range from a regular highway map to a city map. We recommend you try each of them. Every one of the maps will give you a different gaming experience. Additionally, you can access three game modes in the driving game: Time, Endless and Fuel. What all three have in common is to go as far as you can by dodging the cars. Don't forget to collect the coins on the way.Perform Close CallsYour objective in the simulator game is to avoid crashing into any vehicle on the road. Pass the levels by fulfilling the tasks you have been given while dodging the cars. Moving through bustling traffic will be a little challenging. Doing close calls will enable you to pass the vehicles at a high speed and earn you a certain amount of coins.Game Modes of Atv Highway TrafficTime Mode: You will have a short period in the mode. Fulfill the tasks in this short time. You can view how many coins you have collected from the upper left corner of the screen.Endless Mode: There are no restrictions on Endless mode. Your job is to perform close calls and collect coins on the road.Fuel Mode: Your vehicle has limited fuel in this mode. You must collect the fuel power-ups to fill the fuel bar. If the bar drops to zero, you will lose the game.ControlsA/D or Left/Right Arrow Keys: MoveW or Up Arrow Key: Activate NitroS or Down Arrow Key: BrakeTab: PauseDeveloperFreezeNova created the Atv Highway Traffic.Similar GamesVehicles Simulator may draw your attention if you like playing Atv Highway Traffic. The game has seven vehicle options ranging from a regular car to a tank. Choose your favorite one and drive your car as you wish.Additionally, you may look up driving games online for more options. You will find many free online games in this category. Please share your gaming experiences with us in the comment section below! We'd love to hear from you.Embed URL:https://www.onlinegames.io/games/2021/unity/atv-highway-traffic/index.htmlThis article was updated on March 13, 20241 Player3DAvoidCarEmbeddableFreeRacingSimulatorSpeedTrafficUnity
